programme.title: Episode 2

programme.title: Episode 3

programme.title: Episode 4

programme.title: Episode 5
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Mind of Evil, S01E05, The Master forms an uneasy alliance with the Doctor so that between them they can subdue the Keller Machine which is now out of control.

programme.title: Episode 6

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E4016, DNA evidence found on a murder victim whose body had been dumped in a Dairy Queen drive-thru leads to the arrest of Houston's notorious "tourniquet killer.

programme.title: The Widow And The Wolf/Texas Drifter
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E04, After the murder of her aunt goes cold, a woman helps launch an advocate group that brings awareness to cases that have gone unsolved.

programme.title: Gone in a New York Minute
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E02, In a city of eight million, landlord Bruce Blackwood disappears without a trace in March 2006. Though there is no body, the NYPD is sure this is a homicide and they spend the next nine years searching for answers.

programme.title: The Bone Keeper
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E22, In December 1985, when human bones are discovered in the woods, it puts an end to the search for missing teen David Reed. David's skull fractures point to murder; but it will be decades before investigators can find his killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E20, Police run down more than 11,000 leads before coming up with a suspect in the murders of three Virginia girls, and the abduction and strangulation of a California woman continue to baffle the investigators more than 11 years after the crime.

programme.title: Devil At The Door
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E02, When 36-year-old computer programmer Lisa Valdez fails to show up for work, her apartment manager finds her brutally murdered. Detectives ask, could she be the victim of a brutal serial killer? Or was Lisa murdered by someone she knew?

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E06, In Missouri, a part-time missionary is convicted, 38 years later, of killing her 5-year-old stepdaughter, and the skeleton of a Michigan boy, dead for 10 years, leads police to a serial killer.

programme.title: The Flaming Gorge Falls/Caught In The Mail
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E16, A man suspected of the cold case murder of his wife and son hatches a new plot to kill his mother and father; and detectives solve the 20-year-old murder of a teenager by tricking her killer into licking an envelope.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E21, Detectives are baffled when two young girls are raped, murdered, and dumped in an abandoned house in Akron, Ohio. And a 26-year-old mother of three disappears on Christmas Eve in 1995, but the missing person case goes cold when police can find few clues

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E11, Police in Overland Park, Kansas, hunt for over 15 years for a serial killer who lures women to Kansas for sadomasochistic sexual trysts at hotels.

programme.title: The Clock Strikes Murder
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E16, When 23-year-old Tonya McKinley is found brutally murdered on New Years Day 1985, a little boy is left motherless. A family must wait 35 years for advancements in forensic science to finally catch a killer using familial DNA.

programme.title: Written In Blood
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E19, In July of 1970, the brutal murder of single mom Loretta Jones leaves four-year-old Heidi motherless. Nearly 40 years later, she vows to solve her mother's cold case.

programme.title: Vanished in Virginia
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E05, When a 30-year-old mother fails to report for duty in Virginia, the Army lists her as AWOL. Her family immediately suspects foul play. They embark on a 13-year quest for answers before an eyewitness blows the case wide open.

programme.title: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E01, A kidnapper grabs 8-year-old Chad Choice from his home in Texas, then torments his parents with two ransom demands. The case goes cold until the parents receive a chilling package in the mail that contains a letter--and a skull.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E10, A forensic dentist helps police nab a child killer by showing that the teeth marks on the killer's arms match the teeth of the murdered boy. And telltale blood stains on a blue bandana solve the 10-year-old case of a teenage girl murdered.

programme.title: Murder In the Midwest
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E03, The body of Lori Nesson is found in a ditch in 1974, yet her death is not ruled a homicide. After four decades, the cause of death is changed to homicide, and the search begins for a killer.

MST3K: The Robot vs. The Aztec Mummy, 19891118000000 +0000, Scientists search for the ancient breastplate of a mummy, culminating in a mad scientist's attempt to fight the creature through the construction of a robot.

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary: The Characters
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary, S01E06, In part one of the complete history of MST3K, Joel and the rest of the crew discuss the show's origins and the DIY feel of the early seasons.

programme.title: Mitchell
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Mitchell, S05E12, The trio sit through a dreary Joe Don Baker disasterpiece as Gypsy tries to find a way to save Joel from being killed by the Mads.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: The Phantom Creeps - Chapter 1: The Menacing Power
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E10, The first installment of the 1939 serial starring Bela Lugosi.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: The Phantom Creeps - Chapter 2: Death Stalks The Highways
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E11, Bela Lugosi stars as Dr. Zorka, inventor of a lethal mechanical spider.
MST3K: Hercules, 19930617000000 +0000, Joel and the Bots have a casual day on the SOL and endure another incoherent Hercules movie (Hercules (1958)).

programme.title: Hercules Unchained
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Hercules Unchained, S04E08, While trying to resolve a quarrel between warring brothers Eteocles and Polynices, Hercules is taken captive by Queen Omphale of Lydia.

programme.title: Hercules Against the Moon Men
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000, S04E10, A race of evil Moon aliens lands in ancient Greece, wreaking havoc for years on the city of Samar. It’s up to the mighty Hercules to end the chaos.

programme.title: Hercules And The Captive Women
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Hercules And The Captive Women, S04E12, The guys face off against Hercules once again as the strong man fights evil Queen Antinea to get his son back in Hercules and the Captive Women.
Backlot: MST3K: Santa Versus Satan, S01E33, This episode of Backlot features an interview with some MST3K crew and other experts as they look back at this quirky Rene Cardona-directed movie.

MST3K: Fugitive Alien, 19910817000000 +0000, Movie constructed from two episodes of a Japanese television show. An alien marauder becomes a fugitive from his planet Valnar's Star, then joins the Earth spaceship Bacchus 3 to fight against his former masters.
Nearlyweds, 20130112000000 +0000, Complications arise when three women (Danielle Panabaker, Jessica Parker Kennedy) learn that their marriages are not official.

Recipe for Love, 20141011000000 +0000, A culinary-school hopeful gets assigned to ghostwrite a cookbook for a popular celebrity chef, but the two of them clash over contradictory cooking styles. However, their shared love of cooking sparks a connection.

Remember Sunday, 20130421000000 +0000, A down-on-her-luck waitress meets jewelry store clerk, Gus, but complications ensue because of his memory problems. A brain aneurysm three years earlier gives Gus a blank slate the second his alarm wakes him each day.
When Calls the Heart, 20130101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Maggie Grace stars as Elizabeth Thatcher, a cultured young teacher in 1910.

programme.title: The Grey-cation
programme.desc: Good Witch, S05E07, Hallmark Original Series. Martha and Tom stay at Grey House.

programme.title: The Treasure
programme.desc: Good Witch, S05E08, Hallmark Original Series. It's Founder's Day in Middleton.

programme.title: The Comet
programme.desc: Good Witch, S05E09, Hallmark Original Series. Middleton is abuzz with the arrival of a comet that appears every hundred years.

programme.title: The Graduation
programme.desc: Good Witch, S05E10, Hallmark Original Series. Grace and Nick's graduation day has arrived.

programme.title: The Anniversary
programme.desc: Good Witch, S06E01, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie and Sam celebrate their first wedding anniversary.

programme.title: The Chili
programme.desc: Good Witch, S06E02, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie and Joy discover a time capsule that Grace buried years ago.

programme.title: The Clock
programme.desc: Good Witch, S06E03, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie, Abigail and Joy browse an estate sale.

programme.title: The Dinner
programme.desc: Good Witch, S06E04, Hallmark Original Series. Martha receives a mysterious letter before a Middleton progressive dinner.

programme.title: The Mandala
programme.desc: Good Witch, S06E05, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie pursues a temporary art history professorship while Sam diagnoses Adam.
The Good Witch's Family, 20080101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Cassie Nightingale and her family receive a visit from a mysterious woman.

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E15, Sheppard and the team discover a world that has technology created by the Ancients. But the planet's royal family does not allow anyone but them to harness the technology and treat the villagers with little dignity.

programme.title: Intervention
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E01, After Colonel Young and his military personnel are captured by the Lucian Alliance, Dannic abandons them on a nearby planet. Meanwhile on the ship, Dr. Rush, Brody, Chloe, and Eli attempt a risky plan to force the Lucians to surrender.

programme.title: Aftermath
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E02, With the need for food and water becoming dire, Dr. Rush manages to find a planet within range that seems viable but can only be accessed by shuttle. When nearing the planet, they encounter violent turbulence and must make a dangerous crash landing.

programme.title: Awakenings
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E03, The Destiny is on a collision course with an ancient ship found floating in space. Panic turns to wonder as the ships dock with each other. The crew discovers that it might hold the key to a connection back to Earth and other hidden secrets.

programme.title: Pathogen
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E04, On Destiny, Chloe's behavior has become a cause of concern and a worried Scott makes a shocking discovery while searching her quarters: a journal with Alien script. He shows it to Young and Rush who decide they must keep a constant eye on Chloe.

programme.title: Message In A Bottle
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E07, A seemingly harmless orb from a dead world is brought back to the base through the Stargate, but the strange device infects O'Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) with an alien organism. Now, the only chance to save him is to let the organism control him!

programme.title: Family
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E08, SG-1 goes on a mission to rescue Teal'c's son, Rya'c, from the grasp of Apophis. But, when they finally reach Rya'c, he doesn't want to be saved -- he's been brainwashed and has accepted Apophis as his god! Can Teal'c find a way to win back his son?

programme.title: Secrets
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E09, The Stargate project is imperiled when a reporter threatens to expose the top-secret portal. O'Neill attempts to stop him while the rest of the team tries to save Jackson's wife who has been impregnated with a Goa'uld. Is this the end of Stargate?

programme.title: Bane
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E10, A giant insect has bitten Teal'c (Christopher Judge) and soon his body will transform into a cocoon and give birth to hundreds of insect aliens. Can the SG-1 team capture one of the bugs, extract the venom and save Teal'c before it's too late?

programme.title: Tok'ra, The - Part 1
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E11, Captain Carter unwillingly becomes the host to a dying Tok'ra, a member of the resistance whose noble goal is to overthrow the evil Goa'uld empire. Now she sees through the Tok'ra's eyes, but can her visions help the SG-1 team save the Tok'ra?

programme.title: Tok'ra, The - Part 2
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E12, The Tok'ra are desperate for hosts so they can continue fighting the Goa'uld. Carter's father, who is dying of cancer, has nothing to lose by volunteering his body. But will he die during the transference...or does fate have something else in store?

programme.title: Spirits
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E13, SG-11 vanishes while negotiating the mining rights on a planet inhabited by a tribe known as the Salish. Can the SG-1 team find their lost colleagues without angering the planet's mystical spirits...or will they become their next victims?

programme.title: Touchstone
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E14, A climate-controlling touchstone is stolen from planet Madrona, causing the weather to rapidly deteriorate. And when the SG-1 team is accused of the theft, O'Neill must pursue the real thief and rescue the missing stone before Madrona perishes.

programme.title: The Fifth Race
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E15, While studying alien wall inscriptions on another planet, O'Neill peers into a viewer that unleashes ancient knowledge into his mind like computer virus. Can the SG-1 team reverse the process before his mind is completely reconfigured.

programme.title: A Matter Of Time
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E16, A black hole swallows the SG-10 team, and O'Neill is sent on a rescue mission. As the hole's pull grows stronger, it draws the Stargate toward it and soon threatens to destroy Earth. Will O'Neill find a way to stop this super-destructive force?

programme.title: Holiday
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E17, Jackson's body is swapped with that of an old Goa'uld enemy. As Jackson lies dying in the alien's ancient body, O'Neill and Teal'c accidentally switch forms too, and unless the alien is captured, all will be trapped in their new bodies forever!

programme.title: Serpent's Song
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E18, SG-1's arch-enemy Apophis is dying and seeks sanctuary with O'Neill. But what he really wants is a new host in exchange for his knowledge of the Goa'uld. Will O'Neill grant his request or send him back to the Goa'uld to face his fate?

programme.title: Slipping Away
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E17, Kelly and Dylan agree to go to Mexico and obtain medication for Lauren. Donna agrees to a date with the persistent David. Gina discovers that her mother spent most of the money she earned skating as a minor.

programme.title: Bobbi Dearest
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E18, Gina decides to sue Felice for $1.1 million. Donna, torn apart by her family's bickering, runs crying to Noah. Matt learns that Lauren has filed for divorce. Dylan nearly dies in a Jet Ski accident.

programme.title: The Leprechaun
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E19, Noah faces foreclosure after failing to make his mortgage payments on the Peach Pit/After Dark building. Steve has a man dress up as a leprechaun and promises a "pot of gold" to the person who catches him.

programme.title: Fortune Cookie
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E20, Dylan's friendly gift to Kelly upsets Gina; Steve is unnerved by a psychic's bitter prediction; David and Claudia lay the groundwork for their faux marriage; a high-school nemesis asks for Donna's help; Matt prepares to advertise on TV.

programme.title: Local Hero
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E22, Kelly and Dylan subdue a man who tries to attack a pregnant woman and her child. Gina receives an offer to become a skating commentator. Noah reveals that he has a half-sister, who is working at a nearby diner.

programme.title: End of the World As We Know It
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E23, Noah's father's company is sued by Matt; Katie moves forward with David; a nannycam catches Matt and Kelly making love; Steve goes Y2Krazy, ignoring - or avoiding - a trip with Janet; a model makes a play for Donna.

programme.title: Agony
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E25, Kelly receives medical treatment and files a police report. Matt helps a thief gain his release through a technicality. Although Dylan warns that she is still fragile, David asks Gina on a date.

programme.title: The Phantom Menace
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E01, Kelly is arrested and held overnight until the shooting is ruled a justifiable homicide. David asks Dylan to move out. Wayne annoys Donna with his cavalier attitude, particularly when he fails to show sensitivity toward Kelly.

programme.title: A Fine Mess
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E04, Steve buys an engagement ring and practices proposals, often with Noah assuming the role of Janet. Dylan grows tired of living with Gina and suggests that she find her own place. David's radio show becomes popular due to his abrasive tactics.

programme.title: The Loo-Ouch
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E05, Steve and Janet announce the pregnancy and engagement to her parents, who respond by calling Janet a disgrace. Matt and Noah each offer to move out so that Steve can move Janet and the baby into the house.

programme.title: 80's Night
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E06, David's radio persona gets flack-and ratings; Matt tries to overturn a death sentence for a rapist-murderer; the after-hours club attracts the wrong attention; Steve haunts the house.

programme.title: Baby, You Can Drive My Car
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E08, Janet begins to panic about wedding preparations. Steve suggests that they organize a scavenger hunt for their friends, with clues providing the location of a party. Gina freaks out when Dylan refuses to pull over and help a stray dog.

programme.title: Family Tree
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E09, Steve and Janet endure various calamaties on their honeymoon. Just as they are beginning to have a good time, Janet goes into labor. Jackie seeks full custody of Erin, and David and Kelly try to keep their sister's spirits up.

programme.title: Nine Yolks Whipped Lightly
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E12, Gina's meeting with her father is unsatisfying, similar to Janet and her parents; Donna can't let go of Noah's accident; Dylan loses control in front of kids, and has second thoughts about Kelly, but is too late.

programme.title: I'm Using You 'Cause I Like You
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E14, Donna and David meet promising new mates; Kelly decides to quit the store; Matt violates his suspension; Dylan suffers from fast-lane acquaintances; the Sanders' hire a nanny.

programme.title: The Final Proof
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E16, Dylan accedes to Shane's demands for Noah; Kelly and Matt prepare to go on a couples game show; Dr. Martin tries to bond with Gina.

programme.title: Eddie Waitkus
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E18, A news report shows a live dead-ringer for Dylan's late father; Noah intrudes on Donna's meeting someone new; Kelly compromises her personal feelings for her profession; David gets the wrong idea when he overhears Camille talking with friends.

programme.title: Potpourri Fire/Austin Cop Collision
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E366, A man is trapped inside a burning home. A police officer in pursuit of a traffic offender is hit by another car.

programme.title: Smart Victim/Speedboat Upside Down
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E274, A woman is trapped in the shower by a would-be rapist. A race boat drive is trapped underwater when his boat flips.

programme.title: Pinellas Ems/Jolly Rancher Heimlich
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E325, A Florida Emergency Medical Services team is observed treating motorcycle accident victims. A 7 year-old boy remembers a life-saving lesson.

programme.title: Sewer Pug/Sand Embankment
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E368, A puppy falls through a crack in a sewer pipe and disappears. A boy is trapped by a sand avalanche he created.

programme.title: Russia/Potty Peril

programme.title: Race Against Time, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E02, A dramatic plane crash finds Hobie and his mother trapped in the rapidly flooding fuselage beneath the sea while Mitch and the Baywatch lifeguards mount a massive rescue effort to save the trapped passengers and crew.

programme.title: Lover's Cove
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E03, Romance is in the air at Baywatch as Mitch and Jackie's friendship grows more intense, Summer and Matt begin a relationship, and Hobie falls in love with Lauren, a junior lifeguard with a devastating secret.

programme.title: Blindside
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E04, John D. Cort, Mitch's friend and a former lifeguard, returns to Baywatch where his life undergoes a devastating change. Meanwhile, Hobie meets a very "unique" new friend.

programme.title: Skyrider
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E05, Summer has love problems when Slade returns from a world surfing tour to discover Matt and Summer are dating. CJ is persistently pursued by a bungee jumping balloonist. Meanwhile, Garner patrols the beach on horseback.

programme.title: Tentacles, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E06, A prison break gone awry finds Mitch held hostage by a beautiful woman and forced to perform surgery on her escaped convict husband. Meanwhile, Matt and Slade decide to settle their mutual affection for Summer in a daring surfing contest.

programme.title: Tentacles, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E07, Mitch removes a bullet from an escaped convict, only to realize that he and his wife have every intention of killing him. Stephanie's sister Caroline arrives with her fiancé, who becomes the target of an attempted murder.

programme.title: Submersion
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E08, Mitch saves two boys from drowning. But when one ends up in a coma, Mitch suffers from PTSD and is left reevaluating his life as a lifeguard.

programme.title: Ironman Buchannon
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E09, Mitch's impending birthday prompts him to train for an ironman competition, getting swept off his feet by a younger woman along the way. Matt takes a night job to save money for a motorcycle, jeopardizing his coworkers through his exhaustion.

programme.title: Tower of Power
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E10, A new lifeguard helps Mitch and the Baywatch lifeguards confront an upsurge in gang activity, and CJ is enamored with a beach magician who nearly drowns during a bungled underwater stunt.

programme.title: The Child Inside
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E11, The Baywatch lifeguards stage a beach-oriented Special Olympics, becoming involved with two young physically-challenged athletes whose parents have abandoned them.

programme.title: Second Time Around
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E12, Jesse Majors, the beautiful motorcycle racer that Matt fell in love with, returns, putting strain on Matt and Summer’s relationship.

programme.title: The Red Knights
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E13, An ad hoc reunion of elite 1950s lifeguards, the "Red Knights," triggers a bar brawl and Ben's resignation. Meanwhile, Mitch helps deliver a baby when the mother goes into premature labor while swimming at the beach.

programme.title: Coronado Del Soul, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E14, The Baywatch lifeguards travel to San Diego for a week where Summer is haunted by the hotel's legendary ghost. CJ grows attached to an orphaned dolphin at Sea World. And Mitch is stranded at sea with his brother when their sailboat capsizes.

programme.title: Coronado Del Soul, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E15, Adrift in the ocean with his semi-conscious brother, Mitch struggles to keep himself and Buzzy alive through the long, cold night. CJ unites an orphaned dolphin with its injured mother, and Summer becomes obsessed with a passionate ghost.

programme.title: Mirror, Mirror
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E16, A beautiful woman and her plain sister compete for Mitch's affection with perilous results. Matt confronts the sudden onset of a paralyzing fear of sharks, that may in reality be a far different fear.

programme.title: The Falcon Manifesto
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E17, An investigative reporter is working on a story which details the sale of U.S. military technology by businessman Edward Falcon. The story is so incriminating that her life is put at risk. Can the Baywatch team help her get out alive?

programme.title: Western Exposure
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E18, Country and Western superstar Jessie Lee Harris takes a detour from his concert schedule and pays a visit to Baywatch in search of his estranged wife and son
